data.name: Space Revenge - Prologue
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST THE FULL GAME NOW

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1446880/Space_Revenge/


About the Game

Notice: A controller is strongly recommended to play this game



A new life was presented before usâ€¦ New planet, new city ... But they attacked us ... And they killed our parents. But luckily Xander picked us up. We have spent all these years training, learning, becoming the best with one goal in mind. THE REVENGE



Space Revenge - Prologue is an action-exploration game. Get ready to assault the enemy's base and get your desired revenge!
With a top down perspective, twin stick controls and a sci-fi mood to explore the enemy base full of dangers. The BSO will make you feel the tension of the game.





ðŸš€ The game features 1 level.
ðŸš€ Gorgeous 3D graphics
ðŸš€ Intense combat action to keep you engaged.
ðŸš€ Use the environment to your own advantage
ðŸš€ Ambient soundtrack



This game works best with a controller, and it is strongly recommended.

data.short_description: Space Revenge - Prologue is an action-exploration game. With a top down perspective, twin stick controls and a sci-fi mood to explore the enemy base full of dangers. Embark in this adventure and hunt down the responsible of your fathers dead. The only way is REVENGE!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2ghz 64 bits
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 600 and above
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: 2ghz 64 bits
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 600 and above
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: ubuntu 18.10
  • Processor: 2ghz 64 bits
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 600 and above or compatible card
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
